00009 #define _h_WINCOMPAT 1
00010 
00011 /*
00012  * the following replaces stdio.h
00013  */
00014 typedef void FILE;
00015 
00016 #define         BUFSIZ          1024
00017 #define         PATHSIZE        1024
00018 
00019 /*
00020  *      Declarations for the CE compatability functions we are providing.
00021  */
00022 void exit(int status);
00023 int _wmkdir(const unsigned short *path);
00024 unsigned short* _wgetcwd(unsigned short *dir, int len);
00025 
00026 extern long lseek(int handle, long offset, int origin);
00027 #define SEEK_CUR    1
00028 #define SEEK_END    2
00029 #define SEEK_SET    0
00030 
00031 #define EOF     (-1)
00032 
00033 /*
00034  * the following replaces fcntl.h
00035  */
00036 #define O_RDONLY        0x0
00037 #define O_WRONLY        0x1
00038 #define O_RDWR          0x2
00039 #define O_ACCMODE       0x3             /* Mask for O_RDONLY | O_WRONLY | O_RDWR */
00040 #define O_NDELAY        0x4             /* Non-blocking I/O */
00041 #define O_APPEND        0x8             /* append (writes guaranteed at the end) */
00042 #define O_NONBLOCK      0x10    /* Non-blocking I/0, but different effect */
00043 #define O_BINARY        0x20
00044 #define O_CREAT         0x40
00045 #define O_TRUNC         0x80
00046 #define O_NOCTTY        0x100
00047 
00048 extern int _wopen(const unsigned short* filename, int oflag, ...);
00049 extern int read(int handle, void* buffer, unsigned int count);
00050 extern int write(int handle, const void* buffer, unsigned int count);
00051 extern int close(int handle);
00052 extern int _wrename(const unsigned short* oldname, const unsigned short* newname);
00053 extern FILE* fdopen(int handle, const unsigned short* mode);
00054 
00055 /*
00056  * The following replaces getopt.h
00057  */
00058 extern int      getopt(int, unsigned short * const *, const unsigned short *);
00059 
00060 /*
00061  * the following replaces io.h and types.h
00062  */
00063 #undef  u_long
00064 #undef  u_short
00065 
00066 typedef unsigned short mode_t;
00067 typedef unsigned char u_char;
00068 typedef unsigned int uint;
00069 typedef unsigned int uint_t;
00070 typedef unsigned int u_int;
00071 typedef unsigned long u_long;
00072 typedef unsigned long ulong;
00073 typedef unsigned short u_short;
00074 typedef unsigned short ushort;
00075 typedef unsigned char unchar;
00076 typedef char* caddr_t;
00077 typedef short pid_t;
00078 typedef unsigned short uid_t;
00079 typedef unsigned short gid_t;

00098 /*
00099  * the following replaces stat.h
00100  */
00101 struct _stat {
00102         unsigned long st_size;  /* file size in bytes                           */
00103         unsigned long st_mode;
00104         time_t st_atime;                /* time of last access                          */
00105         time_t st_mtime;                /* time of last data modification       */
00106         time_t st_ctime;                /* time of last file status change      */
00107 };
00108 
00109 #define         S_IFREG 0100000
00110 #define         S_IFDIR 0040000
00111 
00112 extern int _wstat(unsigned short* path, struct _stat* buffer);
00113 extern int fstat(int filenumber, struct _stat* buffer);
00114

00116  *      The following replaces errno.h
00117  */
00118 
00119 #define EINTR           4
00120 #define ENXIO           6
00121 #define EBADF           9
00122 #define EAGAIN          11
00123 #define EINVAL          22
00124 
00125 extern int errno;

00127 /*
00128  * the following replaces time.h
00129  */
00130 struct tm
00131 {
00132         int tm_sec;
00133         int tm_min;
00134         int tm_hour;
00135         int tm_mday;
00136         int tm_mon;
00137         int tm_year;
00138         int tm_wday;
00139         int tm_yday;
00140         int tm_isdst;
00141 #define LTZNMAX 50
00142         long tm_tzadj;
00143         char tm_name[LTZNMAX];  /* name of timezone     */
00144 };
00145 
00146 
00147 extern unsigned short* _wctime(const time_t* timer);
00148 extern time_t time(time_t* timer);
00149 extern struct tm *localtime(const time_t* timer);
00150 extern unsigned short *_wasctime(const struct tm *timeptr);
00151 
00152 /*
00153  * the following replaces timeb.h
00154  */
00155 struct timeb {
00156 
00157         time_t time;                    /* time, seconds since the epoch */
00158         unsigned short millitm; /* 1000 msec of additional accuracy */
00159         short timezone;                 /* timezone, minutes west of GMT */
00160         short dstflag;                  /* daylight savings */
00161 };
00162 
00163 extern void ftime(struct timeb* tp);
00164 
00165 /*
00166  * the following replaces unistd.h
00167  */
00168 extern long nap(long);
00169 extern unsigned int sleep(unsigned int secs);
00170 extern uid_t geteuid(void);
00171 
00172 #define R_OK    4
00173 #define W_OK    2
00174 #define X_OK    1
00175 #define F_OK    0

00177 extern char* strdup(const char *s);
